column1: Questions
column10: Answer 1
column12: Answer 2
column14: Answer 3
column16: Answer 4

column1: Universal Containers wants to ensure that they are accepting clean data from their users and verify that important fields are entered.What should an app builder recommend to meet this requirement?
column10: Make a formula field to check the format of the important fields
column12: Update the important fields to be required on the page layout
column14: Create a workflow rule to check the fields are formatted correctly
column16: Configure a validation to require a field for a specific record type

column1: What are two reasons to create an unmanaged package? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Distributing upgradeable components to other Salesforce orgs
column12: Deploying from a Developer Edition environment
column14: Publishing an application for sale on the AppExchange
column16: Distributing open-source projects on the AppExchange

column1: An app builder has created a custom Lightning App and wants to make it available to the internal users at Universal Containers.Which two steps are necessary to accomplish this task? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Build a Custom Tab for the app
column12: Create a subdomain using My Domain
column14: Upload the app to Static Resources
column16: Create a Visualforce page

column1: Universal Containers uses a private sharing model on Accounts. User A and User B both own Accounts of their own and have both been sent a new Account record in an email owned by User C to take a look at. User A is able to open and view the record but User B receives an insufficient privileges error. User A andUser B have the same role in the Role Hierarchy as User C.What are the three reasons User A has access but User B is unable to access the record? (Choose three.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: User A is in a Public Group that has access via a Sharing Rule
column12: User A and User B have different profiles
column14: User A is on the same Account Team as User C
column16: User C has manually shared the record with User A
column18: User A was granted an additional permission set

column1: Universal Containers uses a custom object called Reviews to capture information generated by interviewers during the candidate process. The Review records are visible to any user that has access to the related custom Candidate record. The VP of Human Resources wants the comment field on the Review to be private to anyone outside of the HR department.How should the app builder meet this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Create a page layout with the field for HR users and another page layout without the field for all other users
column12: Create an Apex sharing rule to share the field with users that have ג€HRג€ in their role
column14: Create a sharing rule to share the field with the VP of HR with Role and Subordinates
column16: Create a page layout with the field and use field-level security to hide the field from all other users

column1: Which feature should an app builder use to ensure that new Leads are automatically sent to the appropriate Sales Rep?
column10: Workflow Rules
column12: Visual Flow
column14: Lead Assignment Rules
column16: Lead Convert

column1: Accounts at Universal Containers are currently readable by all users but editable only by their owners. Management wants to designate some Accounts as VIPAccounts. Only Account owners should have read access to these VIP accounts.What two actions should an app builder take to meet the requirements? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Implement a sharing rule
column12: Change Organization-wide Defaults
column14: Set up an Account Team
column16: Configure a permission set

column1: An app builder has been asked to display an Overdue Date that is two months after a Task's Due Date.Which approach should the app builder take? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Create a formula field using the ADDMONTHS() function
column12: Use Process Builder and set Overdue Date equal to DueDate + 60
column14: Create a formula field using DueDate + 60
column16: Use Process Builder and set Overdue Date equal to DueDate + ((365/12) * 2)

column1: The VP of Sales wants a Chatter post to the All Sales private group when an Opportunity goes to the closed won stage.What two tools should the app builder use to automate this process? (Choose two.)
column10: Process Builder
column12: Big Deal Alert
column14: Workflow
column16: Flow

column1: Universal Containers implemented an application process that uses custom objects Internships and Applications. The organization-wide default for Internships has been set to private and is the master in the master-detail relationship with Applications. The VP of HR wants to allow edit access to Applications to recruiters.How should an app builder configure the proper access? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Create a sharing rule that grants the users Read/Write access to the Application records
column12: Create a queue for the web applications and assign access to the users who will be editing the records
column14: Add a sharing rule that grants the users Read/Write access to the Internship records
column16: Set the organization-wide default on the Applications object to Read/Write

column1: Managers at Universal Containers want a quick way to create additional accounts to form a hierarchy from a parent account record. They want to auto-populate five fields based on the parent to make it easier for users to create the child accounts quickly.What should the app builder recommend?
column10: Custom Global Quick Action
column12: Custom Button on Account
column14: Custom Action on Account
column16: Custom Link on Account

column1: A customer service representative at Cloud Kicks wants to be able to collect information from customers using a series of question prompts. Once the questions are completed, an email should be sent to the customer with a feedback form.What should be used to accomplish this? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Lightning Flow
column12: Process Builder
column14: Apex Trigger
column16: Einstein Next Best Action

column1: The Service Manager would like to highlight case age. When a case is new, they would like to see a green flag on the case record. The flag should be yellow if the case is still open after one day. The flag should be red when cases are open after three days.Which two options should an app builder use to implement this requirement? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Formula Field
column12: IMAGE
column14: VLOOKUP
column16: Quick Action

column1: Sales reps at Universal Containers use Salesforce on their mobile devices. They want a way to add new contacts quickly and then follow up later to complete the additional information necessary.What mobile solution should an app builder recommend?
column10: Use Path and set pre-defined values.
column12: Add a compact layout to Contacts.
column14: Build a global action to create Contacts.
column16: Customize the mobile menu to move Contacts to the top.

column1: Which two standard Lightning page components are available in the Lightning App Builder? (Choose two.)
column10: Highlights Panel
column12: Accordion
column14: Quick Text
column16: Path

column1: Universal Containers has created two custom objects called Seminars and Attendees. Organization-wide defaults for these objects have been set to Private.Universal Containers wants to set up a new junction object between these custom objects. A select group of users should be able to edit records in the junction object.Which two steps should an app builder take to configure the proper security? (Choose two.)
column10: Set Sharing Settings to Read Only on both Master-Detail relationship fields.
column12: Create owner-based sharing rules that give Read access to the master objects.
column14: Create an owner-based sharing rule that gives Read access to the junction object.
column16: Set lookup filters on both junction object relationship fields.

column1: Users at Cloud Kicks provided feedback that the time card custom page layout has too many fields on it, and some fields are only needed if other fields are entered.What should an app builder configure to help with this issue?
column10: Separate page layouts
column12: Dependent picklists
column14: Dynamic forms
column16: Lightning web components

column1: Universal Containers (UC) has 20 different workflows on the Opportunity object. To ensure that updates are processing properly for all field updates; UC has the`Re-evaluate Workflow Rules After Field Change` checkbox checked. Recently after adding a new workflow, users have reported receiving errors about workflow limits.What should an app builder look at to address this issue?
column10: Number of workflows per object limits
column12: Talk to a developer about Apex code issues
column14: Workflows that cause each other to fire back and forth recursively
column16: Workflows on other objects that are being re-triggered

column1: Universal Containers (UC) has several large customers that sell their products through dealers. Each customer and dealer has an individual rep who works directly with UC and each is billed separately.How should an app builder implement these requirements? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Create both customer and dealer as accounts, create account teams on each account and associate the dealer records with the parent account.
column12: Create a single parent record, add each rep as a contact to the parent account and add each dealer as a child record.
column14: Create both customer and dealer as accounts, add each rep as a contact on the corresponding account and create an account hierarchy.
column16: Create a single account record, add each rep as a contact and create a custom dealer object.

column1: An app builder creates an Account validation rule on the Industry field that will throw an error if the length of the field is longer than 6 characters. Another app builder creates a workflow rule with a field update that sets the industry field to technology whenever the billing city field is set to San Francisco.What will happen the next time a sales person saves an Account with a billing city of San Francisco?
column10: The record will NOT save and the validation rule's error message will be displayed.
column12: The record will save but the industry field will NOT change to technology.
column14: The record will save and the industry field will change to technology.
column16: The record will NOT save and the error message will NOT be displayed.

column1: Universal Containers (UC) requires that all users specify a contract is sent on each Opportunity prior to marking it as `Closed Won`. UC wants to be able to report on how many Opportunities have sent Contracts compared to how many have a missing contract when the Opportunities closed.What type of field should an app builder configure to fulfill this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Text Area
column12: Picklist
column14: Checkbox
column16: Text

column1: A production org includes custom objects containing confidential information. A sandbox is needed that includes data records, excludes all of the confidential objects, and can be refreshed weekly.What steps should an app builder take to meet these requirements?
column10: Create a Developer Sandbox and schedule Data Loader to download selected object data weekly.
column12: Create a Partial Copy Sandbox and use a sandbox template.
column14: Create a Full Sandbox and use a sandbox template.
column16: Create a Developer Pro Sandbox and schedule Data Loader to download selected object data weekly.

column1: The VP of Sales at Cloud Kicks wants to have a set of screens to guide the inside sales team through collecting and updating data for leads. Once the leads are updated, the leads should be entered into a marketing journey activated by the sales rep checking the marketing checkbox.How should the app builder accomplish this?
column10: Lighting Flow
column12: Path
column14: Process Builder
column16: Workflow

column1: The convert button on Leads should NOT appear until the Lead Status picklist is set to Qualified.What should an app builder suggest to meet these requirements?
column10: Picklist dependency, page layouts, record types
column12: Process Builder field update, quick action, record type
column14: Page layouts, record types, Process Builder field update
column16: Custom button, validation rule, record types

column1: Representatives at Cloud Kicks use Salesforce to record information for new Leads. When new prospects are added, an outbound message is sent to the data warehouse with the Lead's information.What automation tool should an app builder use to meet this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Design an approval process that sends an outbound message.
column12: Create a workflow rule with an outbound message as the action.
column14: Create a process using Process Builder to send an outbound message.
column16: Use Lightning Flow to send an outbound message.

column1: Duplicate management for Leads has been implemented at Universal Containers but it seems duplicate leads are still being created.The Org Wide Default (OWD) is set to `Private` for Leads.Which two actions help prevent duplicate Leads from being created? (Choose two.)
column10: Change the Lead Matching Rule to Block on Create.
column12: Change the Lead Duplicate Rule details to Bypass Sharing Rules.
column14: Change OWD for Leads to Public Read.
column16: Change OWD for Leads to Public Edit.

column1: Cloud Kicks (CK) has increased its Salesforce development efforts so that it now has multiple custom development efforts happening in parallel. CK’s developers and admins perform the customizations and have complained that working in one sandbox has led to many problems. They have requested a solution in which they can work in at least 20 different sandboxes at once, that all start with the same base configuration and data.What should an app builder utilize to solve the problem?
column10: Partial Copy Sandboxes
column12: Sandbox Refreshes
column14: Sandbox Cloning
column16: Full Copy Sandboxes

column1: Universal Containers is migrating its sales operations from a legacy system that was used in Europe. Opportunities need to be imported with the proper country currency.Which two steps should an app builder configure to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
column10: Include the Currency ISO code in all currency fields in the import file.
column12: Use Data Loader to import the records.
column14: Include the Currency ISO Code Column in the import file.
column16: Use Import Wizard to import the records.

column1: Cloud Kicks wants to set up a new opportunity approval process and execute various action items based on the initial submission.Which three action types should an app builder use in the approval process? (Choose three.)
column10: Email Alert
column12: Task
column14: Outbound Message
column16: Invocable Flow

column1: Universal Containers wants to provide users with a process to create Opportunity records related to an Account. Many fields can be populated based on theAccount record. Some fields require input from the user.What should an app builder configure to meet the requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Process Builder triggered from Opportunity update
column12: Process Builder triggered from Account update
column14: Quick Action on the Account object
column16: Quick Action on the Opportunity object

column1: Universal Containers (UC) has large data volumes and is nearing data storage limits. The planned solution is to archive historical data to reduce data storage inSalesforce; however, UC would still like to use reports, queries, and lookups on the archived information.Which two options could meet this requirement? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Custom objects
column12: External objects
column14: Big objects
column16: Related objects

column1: Cloud Kicks has a sales rep who is stating that their Contact is unavailable for other users to see within Salesforce.In which three ways can an app builder troubleshoot this issue? (Choose three.)
column10: Review the Contact record and ensure it is linked to an Account.
column12: Create an Account Sharing Rule to give the users access to all records.
column14: Create a new Contact and have the users try again.
column16: Confirm whether Default Organization-Wide Sharing Settings provide access to the Account.
column18: Verify the users with the issue have access to the Contact object.

column1: An app builder is tasked with adding key performance indicators on client pages. They want to see a summary of the number of open Opportunities and the number of won Opportunities for each Account.Where should the app builder go to build these new rollups? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Opportunity Object
column12: Lightning Object Creator
column14: Lightning App Builder
column16: Account Object

column1: DreamHouse Realty (DR) employees started using company-owned airplanes for work travel after Ursa Major Solar was acquired. DR executives want to automate the submission travel request forms to enforce the internal policy.How should an app builder automate travel request based on these criteria? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Process Builder
column12: Approval process
column14: Workflow rule
column16: Apex

column1: Service Agents are required to confirm a user's identity before providing support information over the phone.What feature can an app builder use to help agents meet this requirement?
column10: Add Path to the top of the Case layout.
column12: Include Surveys as a Case related list.
column14: Guided Action Flows on the record page.
column16: Case Validation Rules.

column1: Which two solutions prevent a formula field from being referenced by a Roll-Up Summary field? (Choose two.)
column10: A cross-object workflow updating a field referenced by the formula field
column12: A cross-object field reference in the formula field
column14: The CASE() function in the formula field
column16: The NOW() function in the formula field

column1: Which two field types can be referenced by a Roll-Up Summary field using MIN or MAX? (Choose two.)
column10: Checkbox
column12: Percent
column14: Date/time
column16: Formula

column1: An app builder needs to create new automation on an object.What best practice should the app builder follow when building out automation?
column10: One Workflow rule per object.
column12: One invocable process per object.
column14: One record change process per object.
column16: One Flow per object.

column1: What should an app builder do to upgrade an unmanaged package that has been installed into production? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Install the new version to a Developer org then deploy to production.
column12: Uninstall the current version and install the new version.
column14: Click the update link on the Installed Packages page.
column16: Install the new version in a sandbox then deploy to production.

column1: The developer at Universal Containers wants to test code in a sandbox environment. In order to ensure the code works properly, the sandbox needs to have at least half a gigabyte of data. The sandbox will need to be refreshed after each three-day sprint.What type of sandbox should the App Builder provision to the developer? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Partial Data
column12: Full Copy
column14: Developer
column16: Developer Pro

column1: An app builder has modified a Lightning record page for a case and has added an email button item to the page layout; however, users are unable to see the new item on the layout.What are two potential reasons why users are unable to view the item on the Case Lightning record page? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: The email button contains JavaScript.
column12: The page layout excludes the case feed component.
column14: The page layout includes the case feed component.
column16: The case page layout also contains custom buttons.

column1: Ursa Major Solar want to see the Type field from the parent object Galaxy listed on the child record Star. The app builder is receiving an error stating `Picklist values are only supported in certain functions`.What formula should an app builder use to achieve the desired result? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: TEXT(Galaxy__r.Type__c)
column12: VALUE(Galaxy__r.Type__c)
column14: ISPICKVAL(Galaxy__r.Type__c)
column16: FIND(Galaxy__r.Type__c)

column1: Ursa Major Solar wants to convert the relationship between Galaxy and Star from a lookup relationship to a master-detail relationship so each Galaxy record can be equipped with a roll-up summary count of Star records.Which two considerations should be made? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: The Star object has fewer than two existing master-detail relationships.
column12: The Galaxy object is required to contain existing roll-up summary fields.
column14: The Galaxy object has fewer than two existing master-detail relationships.
column16: The Star records are all required to have an existing value in their Galaxy field.

column1: The appraisal team at DreamHouse Realty wants to leverage Salesforce mobile app.What are three things an app builder should do to optimize mobile experience? (Choose three.)
column10: Put the most important fields in the compact layout so they are easy to find.
column12: Create individual customized layouts for different phone operating systems.
column14: Minimize the amount of formula fields and lookup fields to reduce page load time.
column16: Avoid using default fields values so that the user is required to fill in all fields on the screen.
column18: Use Global Actions to make it easy to perform vital functionality on mobile.

column1: Universal Containers allows users to create standard reports on demand.Which three considerations users should be aware of when creating a new report? (Choose three.)
column10: Charts can be added to summary reports to provide a visualization.
column12: Users can require that child objects exist for parent records using a cross filter.
column14: Records will be available in the report regardless of security permissions.
column16: The report type determines the types of records and fields that will be available.
column18: Users will need to add the report to a shared folder for other users to see it.

column1: DreamHouse Realty is rethinking its sandbox utilization strategy after acquiring Cloud Kicks. The Salesforce COE already utilizes a partial and a full sandbox, which it refreshes on their own regular schedules. Teams are expanding and have to begin each of their small projects in a sandbox before committing to the larger pool for collaborative testing while still keeping costs down.What type of sandbox should each team member use?
column10: Partial sandbox
column12: Full sandbox
column14: Developer sandbox
column16: Developer pro sandbox

column1: Managers at Universal Containers want a quick way to create additional accounts to form a hierarchy from a parent account record. They want to auto-populate five fields based on the parent to make it easier for users to create the child accounts quickly.What should the app builder recommend?
column10: Custom Global Quick Action
column12: Create a custom action
column14: Add Path on Account hierarchy
column16: Add a custom Link on Account

column1: Ursa Major Solar has made a great app that leadership wants to share with the world for free via AppExchange.What should an app builder consider about the type of package when uploading to AppExchange?
column10: Unmanaged packages allow for patches on programmatic changes but not Apex.
column12: Managed packages provide intellectual property protection on Apex code.
column14: Managed packages need a per-user charge on AppExchange.
column16: Unmanaged packages can be set up to prevent user customizations.

column1: Ursa Major Solar's sales team has been struggling to enter data on mobile since rollout; the team dislikes scrolling through all of the fields to input only the necessary data.How could the app builder solve this with minimal impact to desktop users? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Filter components by device using Form Factor.
column12: Reorder the fields to make sense for the reps when in the field.
column14: Deselect the phone radio button on the Lightning record page assignment.
column16: Update the training documentation with better screenshots.

column1: Sales reps at Universal Containers create multiple quotes per opportunity.What automation tool should an app builder recommend to delete rejected quotes?
column10: Validation rule
column12: Flow process
column14: Workflow rule
column16: Approval process

column1: Cloud Kicks (CK) wants to set up a custom child object to track gift cards issued to a customer. A key requirement is to track the total number of gift cards opened and gift cards issued on an Account. CK wants to permanently ensure the gift cards are unable to be moved across any other Account once it is created.On the gift card object, what type of field should be created to support this requirement? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Formula
column12: Master-detail relationship
column14: Poll-up summary
column16: Lookup relationship

column1: Universal Containers's app builder has been tasked with replacing workflow rules and Apex triggers with Process Builders where possible.What are two important considerations an app builder should know before the project is started? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Apex has a different SOQL query limit than Flow.
column12: Combine actions when possible.
column14: Create a process for each workflow rule.
column16: Avoid generating infinite loops.

column1: A user is unable to use inline editing on a list view. A quick check verifies the user should be able to perform inline editing as they have been assigned the appropriate permissions.Which two conditions should the app builder review? (Choose two.) (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: If the list view contains more than one record type
column12: If the list view selected is the recently viewed list view
column14: If the list view restricts sharing for the user
column16: If the list view contains a chart created by the user

column1: Service agents at Ursa Major Solar want a more condensed case view. Service agents also want to be able to modify the associated contact and account records from the case page layout on the Lightning record page.Which two components should an app builder use to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
column10: Related record
column12: Rich text
column14: Path
column16: Tabs

column1: The app builder at Ursa Major Solar has just created a master-detail relationship between a parent object Galaxy__c and child object Star__c.What would be the effect of creating this type of relationship if users want to report on Galaxy__c with Star__c? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: A new custom report type will need to be created for Galaxy__c with Star__c.
column12: A Star__c report type with Galaxy__c as a field will be automatically created.
column14: A Galaxy__c with Star__c report type will be automatically created.
column16: A new custom report type will need to be created for Star__c with lookup fields from Galaxy__c.

column1: Cloud Kicks (CK) wants to begin socializing and collaborating within Salesforce around customer accounts to discuss various topics. CK would like all company employees to see these conversations.Which two features of Chatter would meet CK's business needs? (Choose two.)
column10: Use Chatter actions to create tasks to complete.
column12: Set up new public Chatter groups.
column14: Set up new private Chatter groups.
column16: Use post action on the Account object.

column1: What are the limitations of Schema Builder when creating a custom object? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Relationships can be made to any custom objects, but any relationships to standard objects should be built in Lightning Object Manager.
column12: Fields and relationships can be created, but they will be unable to add the fields to the page layout from the canvas.
column14: ג€Saveג€ should be clicked each time a new object, field, or relationship is created.
column16: Custom fields can be added to any custom objects, excluding the formula field types.

column1: Universal Containers has a Lightning record page that supports both the mobile app and desktop. An app builder has downloaded a custom Lightning component from AppExchange, but users are unable to view the component on mobile devices.What can be the issue? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: The record page template is unable to support mobile devices.
column12: The component needs to be activated.
column14: The record page needs to be activated.
column16: The component has been developed for Desktop Pages.

column1: Ursa Major Solar is ramping up the sales team to meet increased demand. As part of the short ramp up for these new reps, the manager wants to provide a help guide to enable reps to easily get help where needed during the different sales processes.Which solution should an app builder recommend? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Flow
column12: Journey Builder
column14: Chatter Publisher
column16: Path

column1: Ursa Major Solar wants to automate a welcome email to new clients and include a customized survey about their buying experience. An app builder is tasked with this project and has very little time to build the solution from scratch.What should the app builder do to meet the deadline and custom requirements? (Community and Correct Answer Mismatch)
column10: Work with a developer to create custom apex code and a Visualforce survey to meet criteria.
column12: Choose a managed package from AppExchange that closely meets the requirements of the project and restricts programmatic development.
column14: Select an unmanaged package from AppExchange that closely meets the requirements of the project that allows programmatic development.
column16: Build the survey declaratively and use a workflow rule to send it to the customer as an external message to meet criteria.
